name: Conditional
text:
With each act of faith/
Thereâ€™s an act of disapperance/
I let one group fade and try to assume my other/
That side of public disagreement/
Denial, undermining/
If I can blend it away/
If I can speak just right/
If I can listen/
I can be among you/
I can convince myself/
I can forget my shell, my face, my mask./
